languages.text: {n}Равор, пристально рассматривающий вид-скрин одного из когитаторов, качает головой.{/n} "Давление падает. Система вентиляции мостика совсем подохла, Лорд-капитан. Нижайше прошу вас переместиться на офицерскую палубу, где будет развернут аварийный штаб. Здесь небезопасно, потому прошу поспешить, пока техножрецы удерживают энергопитание лифта".

{n}Ravor shakes his head, gazing intently at the vid-screen of one of the cogitators.{/n} "The pressure's dropping. The bridge ventilation system is completely busted, Lord Captain. I humbly request that you move to the officers' deck, where the emergency headquarters are to be established. The bridge is no longer safe, so I must ask you to hurry, while the Tech-Priests are still supplying the elevator with power."
languages.original_text: {n}Равор, пристально рассматривающий вид-скрин одного из когитаторов, качает головой.{/n} "Давление падает. Система вентиляции мостика совсем подохла, Лорд-капитан. This place is not safe, so I ask you to hurry while Tech-Priests are still supplying the elevator with Motive Force."

languages.text: {n}Ravor niega con la cabeza, observando atentamente la pantalla de uno de los cogitadores.{/n} «La presión está bajando. El sistema de ventilación del puente ha reventado por completo, Lord Capitán. Humildemente, le ruego que se dirija a la cubierta de oficiales, donde se establecerá el cuartel general de emergencia. El puente ha dejado de ser seguro, así que le pido que aproveche mientras los tecnosacerdotes aún proporcionan energía al ascensor».
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor shakes his head, gazing intently at the vid-screen of one of the cogitators.{/n} "The pressure's dropping. The bridge ventilation system is completely busted, Lord Captain. I humbly request that you move to the officers' deck, where the emergency headquarters are to be established. The bridge is no longer safe, so I must ask you to hurry, while the Tech-Priests are still supplying the elevator with power."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor niega con la cabeza, observando atentamente la pantalla de uno de los cogitadores.{/n} «La presión está bajando. El sistema de ventilación del puente ha reventado por completo, Lord Capitán. Humildemente, le ruego que se dirija a la cubierta de oficiales, donde se establecerá el cuartel general de emergencia. El puente ha dejado de ser seguro, así que le pido que aproveche mientras los tecnosacerdotes aún proporcionan la Fuerza Motriz al ascensor».

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアは首を振りながら、考算機のひとつのスクリーンをじっと見つめる。{/n}「圧力がガクッと下がっています。ブリッジの換気システムが完全に破壊されました、ロード・キャプテン。緊急対策本部を設置するので、士官デッキへ移動されてください。ブリッジは、もはや危険です。技術司祭がエレベーターに動力を供給しているうちに、急いでお逃げください」
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor shakes his head, gazing intently at the vid-screen of one of the cogitators.{/n} "The pressure's dropping. The bridge ventilation system is completely busted, Lord Captain. I humbly request that you move to the officers' deck, where the emergency headquarters are to be established. The bridge is no longer safe, so I must ask you to hurry, while the Tech-Priests are still supplying the elevator with power."

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアは首を振りながら、考算機のひとつのビデオ画面をじっと見つめる。{/n}「圧力がガクッと下がっています。ブリッジの換気システムが完全に破壊されました、ロード・キャプテン。緊急対策本部を設置するので、士官デッキへ移動されてください。ブリッジは、もはや危険です。技術司祭がエレベーターに動力を供給しているうちに、急いでお逃げください」

languages.text: {n}雷沃摇了摇头，目不转睛地盯着某台沉思者的视讯屏幕。{/n}“船长老大，压力正在不断下降，舰桥的通风系统已经彻底完蛋了。我谦卑地请求你去军官甲板那边，我们可以在那里建立紧急指挥中心。舰桥已经不安全了，趁着那些技术神甫还能给电梯供电，你得抓紧时间，赶紧过去。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor shakes his head, gazing intently at the vid-screen of one of the cogitators.{/n} "The pressure's dropping. The bridge ventilation system is completely busted, Lord Captain. I humbly request that you move to the officers' deck, where the emergency headquarters are to be established. The bridge is no longer safe, so I must ask you to hurry, while the Tech-Priests are still supplying the elevator with power."

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃摇了摇头，目不转睛地盯着某台沉思者的视讯屏幕。{/n}“船长老大，压力正在不断下降，舰桥的通风系统已经彻底完蛋了。我谦卑地请求你前往军官甲板，我们可以在那里建立紧急指挥中心。舰桥已经不安全了。趁着那些技术神甫还能给电梯提供源力，你得抓紧时间，赶紧过去。”

languages.text: {n}Ravor schüttelt den Kopf und blickt konzentriert auf den Vid-Bildschirm eines Cogitators.{/n} "Der Druck fällt ab. Das Belüftungssystem der Brücke ist vollkommen zerstört, Lord Captain. Ich bitte demütigst darum, dass Ihr Euch zum Offiziersdeck begebt, wo das Notfallhauptquartier errichtet wird. Die Brücke ist nicht mehr sicher. Ich muss Euch daher bitten, Euch zu beeilen, während die Techpriester den Aufzug noch mit Energie versorgen."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor shakes his head, gazing intently at the vid-screen of one of the cogitators.{/n} "The pressure's dropping. The bridge ventilation system is completely busted, Lord Captain. I humbly request that you move to the officers' deck, where the emergency headquarters are to be established. The bridge is no longer safe, so I must ask you to hurry, while the Tech-Priests are still supplying the elevator with power."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor schüttelt den Kopf und blickt konzentriert auf den Vid-Bildschirm eines Cogitators.{/n} "Der Druck fällt ab. Das Belüftungssystem der Brücke ist vollkommen zerstört, Lord Captain. Ich bitte demütigst darum, dass Ihr Euch zum Offiziersdeck begebt, wo das Notfallhauptquartier errichtet wird. Die Brücke ist nicht mehr sicher. Ich muss Euch daher bitten, Euch zu beeilen, während die Techpriester den Aufzug noch mit der Antriebskraft versorgen."

languages.text: {n}Ravor secoue la tête, le regard rivé sur l'écran de l'un des cogitateurs.{/n} « La pression est en chute libre et le système de ventilation est complètement défaillant, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. La passerelle n'est plus sûre, je vous demande donc humblement de vous rendre sur le pont des officiers, où nous allons installer un quartier général d'urgence. Vous devriez vous hâter de rejoindre l'ascenseur tant que les technoprêtres l'alimentent encore. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor shakes his head, gazing intently at the vid-screen of one of the cogitators.{/n} "The pressure's dropping. The bridge ventilation system is completely busted, Lord Captain. I humbly request that you move to the officers' deck, where the emergency headquarters are to be established. The bridge is no longer safe, so I must ask you to hurry, while the Tech-Priests are still supplying the elevator with power."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor secoue la tête, le regard rivé sur l'écran de l'un des cogitateurs.{/n} « La pression est en chute libre et le système de ventilation est complètement défaillant, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. La passerelle n'est plus sûre, je vous demande donc humblement de vous rendre sur le pont des officiers, où nous allons installer un quartier général d'urgence. Vous devriez vous hâter de rejoindre l'ascenseur tant que les technoprêtres l'alimentent encore en Force Motrice. »

languages.text: {n}Ravor, başını sallayıp dikkatli bir şekilde bir kavramsayarın video ekranını izliyor.{/n} "Basınç düşüyor. Köprü havalandırma sistemi tamamen çöktü Lord Kaptan. Subay güvertesine geçiş yapmanızı rica etmek durumundayım. Oraya bir acil durum merkezi kurulabilir. Köprü artık güvenli değil, o yüzden de Tekno Rahipler asansöre hâlâ güç sağlayabiliyorken acele etmenizi rica ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor shakes his head, gazing intently at the vid-screen of one of the cogitators.{/n} "The pressure's dropping. The bridge ventilation system is completely busted, Lord Captain. I humbly request that you move to the officers' deck, where the emergency headquarters are to be established. The bridge is no longer safe, so I must ask you to hurry, while the Tech-Priests are still supplying the elevator with power."
